yaml.title: Sanjeeva Reddy Dodlapati
yaml.subtitle: Software Engineer & AI/ML Researcher ‚Ä¢ 6+ Years Experience ‚Ä¢ Genomics & Drug Discovery Expert

markdown.markdown:
:::{.animate-fade-in}
I'm a **Software Engineer & AI/ML Researcher** specializing in designing AI-powered systems that integrate generative AI, agentic AI, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). With 6+ years of experience developing predictive models and scalable ML pipelines for genomics, drug discovery, and healthcare applications.
4
Publications
50%
Coverage Boost
38%
F1 Improvement
6+
Years Experience
**üèÜ Recent Recognition:** Best Mentor Award from ODU (2023)
::: --- ## üéì Education ::: {.card} ::: {.card-body} **PhD in Computer Science (GPA: 3.9/4.0)** ‚Ä¢ *Old Dominion University, Norfolk, VA* (2019-2025) *Specialization: AI/ML for Computational Biology* **MS in Computer Science (GPA: 3.5/4.0)** ‚Ä¢ *Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA* (2023-Present) *Focus: Advanced Machine Learning Systems* ::: ::: --- ## üíº Professional Experience ::: {.row} ::: {.col-md-6} ::: {.card} ::: {.card-header} ### üî¨ Research Experience ::: ::: {.card-body} - **Graduate Research Assistant** ‚Ä¢ *Old Dominion University* (2019-Present) - **Research Intern** ‚Ä¢ *Boehringer Ingelheim, CT* (2018) - **Research Leadership** ‚Ä¢ 5+ independent projects - **Collaborative Research** ‚Ä¢ LSU, UMich partnerships ::: ::: ::: ::: {.col-md-6} ::: {.card} ::: {.card-header} ### üë®‚Äçüè´ Teaching ::: ::: {.card-body} - **Teaching Assistant** ‚Ä¢ *Department of Computer Science, ODU* - **Graduate Instructor** ‚Ä¢ *Data Structures & Algorithms* - **Mentor** ‚Ä¢ *Undergraduate Research Projects* ::: ::: ::: ::: --- ## üíª Technical Expertise ::: {.row} ::: {.col-md-4} ::: {.card} ::: {.card-body} **ü§ñ AI/ML Technologies** PyTorch, TensorFlow, LangChain, LlamaIndex, RAG Systems, Vector Databases ::: ::: ::: ::: {.col-md-4} ::: {.card} ::: {.card-body} **üß¨ Bioinformatics** Bioconductor, DESeq2, RDKit, DeepChem, ChemProp, MEME-suite ::: ::: ::: ::: {.col-md-4} ::: {.card} ::: {.card-body} **‚òÅÔ∏è MLOps & Cloud** Docker, MLflow, AWS, GCP, Kubernetes, CI/CD Pipelines ::: ::: ::: ::: --- ## üöÄ Featured Research Projects ::: {.row} ::: {.col-lg-4} ::: {.card .project-card} ::: {.card-body}
üß¨
**OmicsOracle AI Agent** Intelligent data agent that extracts, analyzes, and visualizes genomic data from NCBI GEO automatically.
Python LangChain RAG
::: ::: ::: ::: {.col-lg-4} ::: {.card .project-card} ::: {.card-body}
ü§ñ
**ClinicalNormBERT** Personalized clinical text normalization model improving healthcare data extraction accuracy.
BERT NLP Healthcare
::: ::: ::: ::: {.col-lg-4} ::: {.card .project-card} ::: {.card-body}
üíä
**Chiral Drug Synthesis** Developed chiral sulfanilamide candidates with >99% enantio-selectivity at Boehringer Ingelheim.
Cheminformatics RDKit Drug Discovery
::: ::: ::: ::: --- ## üìö Recent Publications ::: {.content} 1. **Sanjeeva Dodlapati**, ZC Jiang, J Sun. [*Completing Single-Cell DNA Methylome Profiles via Transfer Learning together with KL-Divergence*](https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fgene.2022.910439/full). **Frontiers in Genetics** (2022) 2. [*Loss of Acta2 in cardiac fibroblasts does not prevent the myofibroblast differentiation or affect the cardiac repair after myocardial infarction*](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.yjmcc.2022.08.003). **Journal of Molecular and Cellular Cardiology** 171, 117-132 (2022) 3. [*The landscape of accessible chromatin in quiescent cardiac fibroblasts and cardiac fibroblasts activated after myocardial infarction*](https://doi.org/10.1080/15592294.2021.1982158). **Epigenetics** (2021) ::: --- ::: {.text-center} ## ÔøΩÔøΩ Research Focus Areas **Agentic AI Systems** ‚Ä¢ **Retrieval-Augmented Generation** ‚Ä¢ **LLM Orchestration** ‚Ä¢ **Genomics** ‚Ä¢ **Drug Discovery** ‚Ä¢ **Cheminformatics** ‚Ä¢ **Transfer Learning** ‚Ä¢ **MLOps** ‚Ä¢ **Uncertainty Quantification** ::: --- ::: {.text-center .mt-4} *Exploring the intersection of AI and biological systems to advance scientific discovery and improve human health.* [**Explore My Research**](ml-blog.html){.btn .btn-primary .me-2} [**View Publications**](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=7FND004AAAAJ&hl=en&authuser=1){.btn .btn-outline-primary} :::
